displayAddress: ALDERSHOT ENTERPRISE CENTRE, 14-40 VICTORIA ROAD, ALDERSHOT HAMPSHIRE GU11 1TQ
detailedDescription: LOCATION The property is located at the bottom of Victoria Road and being directly opposite the Nissan Car Showrooms and close to the main railway station. The Wellington Shopping Centre is within a short distance of the premises. The M3 (junction 4) is approximately 5 miles to the north and the close proximity of the Blackwater Valley Relief road (A331) links Aldershot and the M3. Aldershot main line railway station provides a fast and frequent service to Waterloo at merely 50 minutes travel time. DESCRIPTION Comprising an office building arranged over ground, first and second floors, offering various sized serviced office suites accessed via a communal entrance and staircase with manned reception desk. The offices are served with HVAC heating/air conditioning, lighting and power, carpeting, and the use of a large on site car park where spaces are available from £30 pcm per space. All of the offices are in excellent decorative order and have the use of shared separate male and female toilet facilities. Office furniture is also available. ACCOMMODATION The approximate nett floor area for each available suite are as follows: Office 2 (Boardroom) 149 sq ft 13.84 sq mt Office 12 126 sq ft 11.70 sq mt Office 14 127 sq ft 11.79 sq mt Office 23 151 sq ft 14.02 sq mt Office 25 183 sq ft 17.00 sq mt Office 30 474 sq ft 44.03 sq mt AMENITIES On site Café Car Parking – £30 pcm for one space Carpeting and lighting throughout Manned Reception Desk 24/7 Secure Access HVAC heating/Air Conditioning Good insulation Superfast Internet/Wi Fi LICENCE A 12 month renewable licence is offered with a minimum licence term of 3 months. A deposit will be required of one months rent. Other terms on application. All rents are plus VAT. RENT Office 2 – £564.65 + VAT (deposit £677.58) Office 12 – £477.49 + VAT (deposit £572.99) Office 14 – £481.28 + VAT (deposit £577.54) Office 23 – £572.23 + VAT (deposit £686.68) Office 25 – £693.50 + VAT (deposit £832.20) Office 30 £1,796.28 + VAT (deposit £2,155.54) LEGAL COSTS Each party to cover their own legal costs to be incurred in any new licence. POSSESSION – On completion of any Licence Agreement and payment of the first months rent and deposit. LOCATION The property is located in a vibrant area of Grosvenor Road close to the junction of Laburnum Road and Birchett Road close to the Memorial Municipal Gardens and Old Town Hall. Aldershot has excellent communications with access to the A31 to Farnham, Alton and Guildford being approximately 2 miles to the south. The M3 (junction 4) is approximately 5 miles to the north and the close proximity of the Blackwater Valley Relief road (A331) links Aldershot and the M3. Aldershot main line railway station provides a fast and frequent service to Waterloo at merely 50 minutes travel time. DESCRIPTION Currently trading as TLC Adult Entertainment premises under a licence permitting the retail sale and supply of alcohol, the provision of regulated entertainment by way of dance performances. Operating hours are from 11am to 4am on any day. ACCOMMODATION The Club is arranged on ground floor and comprises a bar area, single male and female WC facilities seating and VIP booths to the front and side together with security booth. To the rear of the property is a recent two storey extension providing living accommodation. The first floor is accessed via a tread timber staircase and comprises of a number of rooms of a central corridor to include shower and toilet facilities. All as indicated on the attached plans The approximate nett floor areas are as follows: Total Gross Approx area 3,100 sq ft 287.99 sq nts AMENITIES Prominently located Car Parking to the rear Floor covering and lighting Full gas fired central heating Good insulation Fitted Kitchen PRICE For the benefit of the entire property with full vacant possession – Offers in excess of £625,000 subject to contract only . displayAddress: UNIT 19, BLACKWATER WAY, ALDERSHOT, HANTS, GU12 4DN
detailedDescription: LOCATION The property is located less than five minutes’ drive from the Blackwater Valley Relief Road which links Aldershot to Junction 4 of the M3 and the Hog’s Back A31. Blackwater Way is an established industrial area where a variety of commercial and industrial users are located. Aldershot’s main line railway station provides a frequent service to London Waterloo (50 minutes). DESCRIPTION The property comprises a detached industrial unit on a site of approximately .218 acres (0.008 hectares) with a direct frontage to Blackwater Way. The building is of steel frame construction with profile clad elevations under a pitched roof. displayAddress: 3-4 ALEXANDRA TERRACE, ALEXANDRA ROAD, ALDERSHOT HAMPSHIRE GU11 3HU
detailedDescription: LOCATION: Ideally positioned in the centre of Aldershot, opposite the Westgate Centre and within walking distance of Aldershot station (Waterloo – fastest journey approximately 45 minutes) and the Tesco Superstore. Road communications are efficient as the property is situated just off the A323 Wellington Avenue which links with the main A325 Farnborough Road less than ½ a mile away. The Blackwater Valley relief road (A331) has north and south communications between Camberley, Farnborough, Aldershot, Farnham and Guildford. DESCRIPTION: An attractive three storey terraced period style office building constructed in the late 1980’s with car parking to the rear. Internally the property is presented in a good decorative order including the following facilities: AMENITIES: Carpeting throughout Gas Fired Central Heating Tiled Ladies & Gents Toilets Fire Alarm Wall & Ceiling Lighting 10 Car Parking Spaces Kitchen Facility Cellular & Open plan offices ACCOMMODATION: Ground Floor Offices 1,492 sq ft (138.61 m²) First Floor Offices 1,413 sq ft (131.29 m²) Second Floor Offices 1,536 sq ft (142.70 m²) TOTAL NETT INTERNAL 4,441 sq ft (412.60 m²) LEASE: A new lease was granted to the Midlands Partnership NHS Foundation Trust on 4 September 2020 for a term of approx. 5 years expiring on 30 September 2025. The current rent is £55,500 per annum exclusive on and from 1 October 2023. The lease has been granted outside the Landlord & Tenant Act. FREEHOLD: The freehold investment of 3-4 Alexandra Terrace is available and with the benefit of the incumbent tenant MPFT as stated above in the sum of £900,000 . However, the freeholders are also offering the investment sale of 1 Alexandra Terrace* and 2 Alexandra Terrace* adjoining and where they are seeking £1.76 million (no VAT applicable) for all four investment units and which combined provide a current rental income of approx £112,500. BUILDING INSURANCE: Annual building insurance premiums on 3-4 Alexandra for the period 1 May 2023 through to 2 May 2024 £1,990 inclusive of property management fees. SERVICE CHARGE: The landlord runs an estate service charge for maintaining the common parts of the estate and this is currently running at £2,400 per annum and which has remained at the same level for the past 15 years. RATES: Rateable Value £46,000 – UBR £ 51.2p (2023/2024) LEGAL COSTS: Each party to pay their own legal costs incurred in the transaction. AML In accordance with Anti-Money Laundering Regulations, two forms of identification and confirmation of the source of funding will be required from the successful purchaser. VIEWING: Strictly by prior appointment with the Sole Agents: Emberson & Co., First Floor, 4 Castle Street, Farnham Surrey GU9 7HR Tel No: (01252) 329129 . Or (01252) 727595. displayAddress: FIRST FLOOR 12-14 UNION STREET, ALDERSHOT, HAMPSHIRE GU11 1EG
detailedDescription: SITUATION: Located above a ground floor double fronted shop in the central retail area of Aldershot on the north side of Union Street midway between the junctions with Grosvenor Road and Short Street. Nearby traders include McDonalds, PDSA, Pizza GoGo and Savers. Within a short distance of the property is Aldershot main railway station (Waterloo – 50 mins). Nearby car parks include the Wellington Centre multi storey car park and the underground Morrisons Car Park. DESCRIPTION: Comprising of first floor offices/rooms configured as to 5 cellular offices with single male and female WCs, small staff room with wash hand basin. Fully carpeted throughout and fitted with suspended acoustic tiled ceiling with recessed spot lights. Access to the first floor is gained from a private entrance door located to the left hand side of the shop unit. ACCOMMODATION: The property has the following approximate floor areas:- First Floor 775 sq ft (71.87 sq mts) Staffroom 123 sq ft (11.47 sq mts) Ancillary Stores 342 sq ft (31.81 sq mts) Total Overall Floor Area 1,240 sq ft (115.15 sq mts) USE: Other uses such as Nail Bar, Beauticians, Massage/Alternative Medicine etc would be permitted subject to the usual planning. LICENCE: The premises are available by way of a short term one year licence agreement and which would be granted outside the Landlord & Tenant Act 1954 excluding security of tenure provisions. Alternatively longer leases would be available by negotiation. RENT: Rent £12,000 per annum exclusive of rates, and electricity. Any incoming tenant would need to arrange their own contents insurance.. RATES: Rates payable for the first floor are approx. £5,290 per annum. LEGAL COSTS: The ingoing licensee/lessee is to be responsible for the administration costs in preparing the licence agreement and/or lease and arranging for a Statutory Declaration to be completed. POSSESSION: On completion of all legal formalities. VIEWING: Strictly by prior appointment with the Sole Agents: Emberson & Co., First Floor, 4 Castle Street, Farnham Surrey GU9 7HR. Tel No: (01252) 329129 or (01252) 727595.
